```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(arcos)
library(dplyr)

key <- "uO4EK6I"

arcos <- summarized_county_annual(key = key) %>%
  clean_names()

arcos_state <- arcos %>%
  select(buyer_state, year, dosage_unit) %>%
  group_by(buyer_state) %>%
  summarise(dosage_unit = sum(dosage_unit))

```
